Here the future restoration of the people of God is brought to view for our encouragement. Lay up these words in your heart. Accept Christ as your 


                                  -37- 

Saviour. Make Him your friend. Take the offered salvation, and place yourself wholly on the Lord's side. Every member of your family should now consecrate himself to the service of God. Do not disband, but draw together. Depend on Christ alone for your salvation.
